articles.author: Vivian Ho
articles.title: ‘Naughty’ bears escape, steal a week’s worth of honey and take long nap - The Washington Post
articles.description: European brown bears Mish and Lucy, both 5, escaped their enclosure at the Wildwood Devon conservation park in Britain and promptly helped themselves to lots of snacks.
articles.content: In the fairy tale, Goldilocks enters the home of thethree bears to eat their porridge and sleep in their beds. But at the Wildwood Devon conservation park in Britain, its the bears who are doing the … [+4131 chars]
